
``standardise_giotto``
==========================

standardise_giotto

Description
-----------

standardises a matrix

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   standardise_giotto(x, center = TRUE, scale = TRUE)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - matrix
   * - ``center``
     - center data
   * - ``scale``
     - scale data


Value
-----

standardized matrix
